title: In-game freezes and ping spikes with occasional DCs since 3 days ago (4/4/15)
body:
Was wondering if anyone has experienced sudden in-game freezing or ping spikes around the same time that I did aka 4/4/15.  

I would like to further include that I am on TPG and that if you're also a TPG-user and have fixed this problem, do share your solution.

Cheers

UPDATE EDIT: Hey guys!! I fixed the problem by disabling ipv6 and changing my MTU! hope it helps anyone who might be having similar problems

replies.body:
You disabled your IPv6? Be sure you know how to get it back, as it may be the only way to communicate to the internet in the future.

Probably the far, distant, future; so you shouldn't really worry about it.
